    • Method Detail

      • isNMSAvalible

        public static boolean isNMSAvalible()
        Checks if nms could be used on this server
        Returns:
        true if it can be, false if there is no nms binding

      • getNMSPackageVersion

        public static String getNMSPackageVersion()
        Gets the package version for nms use on this server
        Returns:
        the version or "UNKNOWN"

      • getServerVersion

        public static Protocol getServerVersion()
        Get the server version
        Returns:
        the server version

      • kick

        public static void kick(Throwable e)
        Kick an exception to the console. Allows use for listeners and formatting.
        Parameters:
        e - the exception or throwable to kick to the console

      • getAnchors

        public static GList<Class<?>> getAnchors(String tag)
        Get anchored classes by the given anchor tag name. Used for getting groups of classes with @Anchor("tag") after the jar is crawled for anchors in classes
        Parameters:
        tag - the tag to find in crawled classes
        Returns:
        a list of classes with the given tag. If no classes are found or there is no known tag, an empty list will be returned

      • crawlJar

        public static void crawlJar(File jar)
        Crawl a jar. Async safe. Phantom is crawled on startup
        Parameters:
        jar - the jar to crawl.

      • isActive

        public static boolean isActive(IPawn pawn)
        Check if a pawn is activated. Use for singular pawns
        Parameters:
        pawn - the pawn to check
        Returns:
        true if the pawn is active. False if the pawn is inactive, not known, does not have an @Name tag, or is not singular

      • getService

        public static <T extends IService> T getService(Class<? extends T> svc)
        Gets the service from the service manager. If the service is not running, it will be spun up. If the service does not exist, a null pointer will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        svc - the service class requested
        Returns:
        the active service of the type requested

      • isServerThread

        public static boolean isServerThread()
        Check if the current thread is the server thread (sync).
        Returns:
        returns true if on the main thread, false if otherwise

      • touch

        public static void touch(PhantomPlugin inst)
        Internal use for setting up phantom on startup. Calling this is not wise.
        Parameters:
        inst - the phantom instance

      • pulse

        public static void pulse(Signal signal)
        Pulse a signal to phantom (internal use)
        Parameters:
        signal - the signal to pulse to DMSp

      • register

        public static void register(org.bukkit.event.Listener listener)
        Register a bukkit event listener
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to register

      • unregister

        public static void unregister(org.bukkit.event.Listener listener)
        Unregister a bukkit event listener
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to unregister

      • claim

        public static void claim(IPawn owner,
                         IPawn claimed,
                         Field field)
        Force claim a pawn as your own subpawn. You need a field which will hold the pawn, and it is trusted that you place the given (claimed) pawn into the given field pawn before calling this.
        Parameters:
        owner - the owner pawn (super)
        claimed - the claimed pawn (sub)
        field - the field in which the claimed pawn (sub) is placed which the field should reside in the claiming owner pawn (super)

      • activate

        public static void activate(IPawn pawn)
        Activate a pawn
        Parameters:
        pawn - the pawn to activate. If a pawn is singular and it is activated but another pawn of the same type is already activated, an exception will be kicked to the console

      • deactivate

        public static void deactivate(IPawn pawn)
        Deactivate a pawn
        Parameters:
        pawn - the pawn to shut down

      • sendConsoleMessage

        public static void sendConsoleMessage(String message)
        Send a console message. The message will not be sent if called off of the main thread
        Parameters:
        message - the message to send.

      • getVersion

        public static String getVersion()
        Get the version of phantom
        Returns:
        phantom's version

      • startTask

        public static int startTask(int delay,
                            Runnable r)
        Start a bukkit scheduled task
        Parameters:
        delay - the delay before running
        r - the runnable to run
        Returns:
        the task id

      • startRepeatingTask

        public static int startRepeatingTask(int delay,
                                     int interval,
                                     Runnable r)
        Start a repeating task
        Parameters:
        delay - the delay before running
        interval - the interval between runs (0 is every tick)
        r - the runnable to run
        Returns:
        the task id

      • stopTask

        public static void stopTask(int id)
        Stop a task
        Parameters:
        id - the task to stop by id
